message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I believe it's incredibly valuable, and I'm initially setting the price at $18,000. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be able to meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is quite high for me. Could you consider $15,000?  It would allow me to feel comfortable letting it go.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still not able to meet you at $15,000. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Would you be able to consider this price?
